thread.title: McAuliffe Signs Order to Strengthen Cyber Security in VA
thread.title_full: McAuliffe Signs Order to Strengthen Cyber Security in VA

title: McAuliffe Signs Order to Strengthen Cyber Security in VA
text:
01 McAuliffe Signs Order to Strengthen Cyber Security in VA 
NBC: RICHMOND – Today Governor McAuliffe signed Executive Directive 6 to strengthen the Commonwealth’s cybersecurity measures in order to protect personal information and sensitive data through the expansion of cyber-related risk management activities.
